buffs.description: The orc tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by orc unit seals.
buffs.name: Orc Token

hidden_abilites: Increases its movement speed by 8%, and its attack range by 10%.
Increases the movement speed and attack range of all units by 5%, and the attack power of all units by 8%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
[ Limit Break of Orc Token ] : The orc tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by orc unit seals.
description.skill1: Increases the Orc Tribe Friendliness gained by from Unit Seals (10%, 30%, 50%, 70%, 100%)
description.skill2: Increase attack speed of Orc units in Outland Battle. (0%, 0%, 4%, 7%, 14%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Rangda ]
